title: Please give the player a reasonable explanation
body: Hello, customer service! I am an ordinary player, but I have encountered a shameless player in the game. I don't know how to map it to you. You can send me a qualifying match around 06/09/2019 0:30. The player directly ends the game at 0/38/0. After the game is over, there will be proud words. Please handle these players who are disturbing the order in the game. Please trouble this matter, thank you!

replies.body: It's clear that Google Translate still needs some work, but I can tell you that Boards isn't Riot's customer service system.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=PER4vZsJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-06-09T05:53:16.835+0000)
>
> It's clear that Google Translate still needs some work, but I can tell you that Boards isn't Riot's customer service system.

What can I do? pls let me know
